branchCategory.name: Air Operated Valves
branchCategory.description: <p>Air operated valves are available in body ported or base mounted styles.  Many air operated valves use the same manifolds as series solenoid types. One-touch fittings are available on body ported types.  Available thread types are Rc, G, NPT or NPTF.</p>

branchItem.name: SYA
branchItem.description: <P>SYA 5 port air operated valves are available in body ported or base mounted styles.&nbsp; The SYA uses the same manifolds as series SY (non plug-in style) for types 20, 41, 42 and 45.&nbsp;One-touch fittings are available on body ported types.&nbsp; Available thread types are Rc, G, NPT or NPTF.</P>

branchItem.name: SYJA
branchItem.description: <p>The SYJA3000/5000/7000 series are 4 & 5 port air operated valves with rubber seals.  The SYJA300 is 3 port air operated valve with a small profile that increases design flexibility and minimizes space requirements. All SYJA series are available in a body ported or base mounted style.</p>

branchItem.name: VFA
branchItem.description: <p>VFA 5 Port air operated valves are available in body ported or base mounted styles.  The VFA uses the same manifolds as VF Series.</p>

branchItem.name: VPA
branchItem.description: <p>Series VPA4 is a 5 port air operated valve with a rubber seal.  The series is available with or without a sub-plate.  Applicable thread types include Rc, G, NPT, NPTF. Also available is the 3 port VPA300/500/700 in body ported or base mounted styles.  The VPA offers a high flow capacity of Cv1.0 (VPA300), Cv2.3 (VPA500), Cv4.0 (VPA700).  It is possible to use the series as either a selector valve or divider valve. The VPA is changeable from a normally closed style to a normally open style.</p>

branchItem.name: VGA
High Purity
branchItem.description: <p>Valves with fluoropolymer construction or other quality materials for high purity applications.</p>
